data.title: Big Fish Games Customer Service Phone Number (866) 921
data.meta_description: How to contact Big Fish Games customer support at toll-free or general info phone number? Call or write an email to resolve Big Fish Games issues: Product/ Service, Account, Payments and Charges. Visit the company website www.bigfishgames.com or help center for more information.
data.text:
I wasn’t on the phone with them. You can’t contact them by phone. I have been sending messages since March 19. Which is when they gave me advice ti unfree my game. And the n the game was lost. I have been playing for years and if it did y take so long to get where I was I would be done. But I followed their advice lost the game and now they are asking me for my client number but I can’t do that cuz they game is lost. I did let them know there is an incident # hat perhaps they can restore if from there. Still no response

Read full quote
